ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="412307009" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:7491)
This playingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:7493). This playingEntity/code is used to supply a coded term for the drug vehicle (CONF:10086) (CONF:7493, CONF:10086)
This playingEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] name (CONF:7494). This playingEntity/name MAY be used for the vehicle name in text, such as Normal Saline (CONF:10087) (CONF:7494, CONF:10087)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="412307009" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:7491)
This playingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:7493). This playingEntity/code is used to supply a coded term for the drug vehicle (CONF:10086) (CONF:7493, CONF:10086)
This playingEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] name (CONF:7494). This playingEntity/name MAY be used for the vehicle name in text, such as Normal Saline (CONF:10087) (CONF:7494, CONF:10087)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <participantrole xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd" classCode="MANU"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.24"/> <id root="747393743"/> <code code="412307009" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <playingEntity/> </participantrole>
